sentences.en: A plane just landed on the interstate highway outside of town.
sentences.cn: 一架飞机刚刚降落在村外的州际高速公路上.

sentences.en: All east - west interstate highways are even - numbered and increase from south to north.
sentences.cn: 所有东西向的州际高速公路都用偶数标号,数字从南往北递增.

sentences.en: Congress may pass laws that allow states to independently regulate interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 国会可以通过法律允许州独立规制州际商务.

sentences.en: In practice, the most important of these federal powers is the power to regulate interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 这些联邦权力中最重要的是对州际商业的约束权.

sentences.en: Interstate Highway Commission; interstate highways; Interstate Commerce Commission; interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 州际公路考察团; 州际公路; 州际商务委员会; 州际贸易.

sentences.en: Perhaps the area in which preemption is most likely to be found is interstate transportation.
sentences.cn: 最可能发现先占权的领域或许是州际运输业.

sentences.en: Previously, only interstate sales were subject to federal price controls.
sentences.cn: 在此以前, 只有州际间的交易才受联邦价格控制的支配.

sentences.en: The Commission also regulates interstate market securities and enforces laws against unfair and illegal practices.
sentences.cn: 委员会还负责管理州际市场的证券,并对不公平和非法行为实行法律制裁.

sentences.en: The Federal Communication Commission ( FCC ) covers radio and TV transmission and interstate telephone and telegraph.
sentences.cn: 联邦通讯委员会 ( FCC ) 管理广播和电视的传递以及州际电话和电报.

sentences.en: The Seventh Circuit found that the ordinance did place a burden on interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 第七巡回法庭发现,这项法规的确为州际商业增加了负担.

sentences.en: There were to be no tariffs or taxes on interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 对各州之间的贸易不得课取关税或捐税.

sentences.en: This funnel cloud was spotted over Interstate 95 yesterday.
sentences.cn: 在95号洲际公路发现了漏洞云.

sentences.en: Thus it follows that states may not regulate interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 这样便形成了州将不再管理州际贸易的局面.

sentences.en: To them, it's an obstruction of interstate commerce.
sentences.cn: 对他们来说, 这是对州际贸易的障碍.

sentences.en: We were driving along Interstate 280, toward my home in Woodside.
sentences.cn: 我们正驾车沿280号州际公路往我在伍德赛德的家行驶。

words.tran_cn: 潮间带的；高潮线与低潮线之间的
安排于隔层之间；放在层间

phrases.tran_cn: [经]州际贸易，州际商业；美国的州际贸易
美国政府州际商务委员会

trans.tran_en: involving different states, especially in the US
a wide road that goes between states, on which cars can travel very fast
